https://tmrev.io/movie/734725-Crossfire 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ewsGRwV22fLwow5dysggmJ3C1ra.jpg Crossfire is Lauren Southern's third documentary film project focusing on the issues surrounding policing, brutality, race, law and order. A heated debate today which has led to a massive political divide between those supporting officers, those defending reform and even many rioting violently in the streets. Crossfire
